css_value: body.maxi-blocks--active #row-maxi-88d746c3-u{box-shadow:0px 0px 0px 0px rgba(var(--maxi-dark-color-8,9,60,88),1);border-color:rgba(var(--maxi-dark-color-5,255,255,255),1);border-style:solid;border-top-width:2px;border-right-width:0px;border-bottom-width:2px;border-left-width:0px;min-width:100%;padding-top:40px;padding-bottom:40px;flex-wrap:wrap;row-gap:20px;-moz-column-gap:2.5%;column-gap:2.5%;}body.maxi-blocks--active #row-maxi-88d746c3-u > .maxi-background-displayer{border-color:rgba(var(--maxi-dark-color-5,255,255,255),1);border-top-width:2px;border-right-width:0px;border-bottom-width:2px;border-left-width:0px;border-top-style:solid;border-right-style:solid;border-bottom-style:solid;border-left-style:solid;top:-2px;bottom:-2px;left:0px;right:0px;}@media only screen and (min-width:1921px){body.maxi-blocks--active #row-maxi-88d746c3-u{padding-top:60px;padding-bottom:60px;}body.maxi-blocks--active #row-maxi-88d746c3-u > .maxi-background-displayer{border-style:solid;}}@media only screen and (max-width:1920px){body.maxi-blocks--active #row-maxi-88d746c3-u > .maxi-background-displayer{border-style:solid;}}@media only screen and (max-width:1366px){body.maxi-blocks--active #row-maxi-88d746c3-u{padding-top:30px;padding-bottom:30px;}}@media only screen and (max-width:1024px){body.maxi-blocks--active #row-maxi-88d746c3-u{padding-top:25px;padding-bottom:25px;}}@media only screen and (max-width:767px){body.maxi-blocks--active #row-maxi-88d746c3-u{padding-top:20px;padding-bottom:20px;}}
